summary: Completely removes spider from the game for those who afraid of them.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]What is This?[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This mod removes spiders from the game for those who afraid of them. Since I can't remember a quest where you have to kill a spider, this mod probably will not effect the quest lines.

[/size][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]How to Install?[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Automatically by NMM or manually dragging the esp to your data folder.[/size][/font][/center]
author: ProtologolusX
